#summary Tasks to perform when creating a release of MolTK

=Tasks to perform when creating a release of MolTK=

  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Print out this page to use it as a literal check list
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Check out a fresh working copy of MolTK in a new folder (rename or delete your old folder)
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Set version number in top level CMakeLists.txt
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Review User Manual for changes, including updating version number.
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Update User Manual pdf
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Add News item to website index.html
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Windows:
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Make sure you are building in Release mode
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Rebuild python module
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Ensure all unit tests pass
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Regenerate Python API documents
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Regenerate C++ API documents
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Build python installer
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Test python installer
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Check in regenerated content
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Create an svn tag for release (e.g. rel_0.4.0)
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Google Code site:
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Add User Manual to downloads (copy pdf with version number, delete after added to downloads)
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Add Windows python installer to downloads
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Test installer on a virgin virtual machine
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Web site:
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png {{{svn update}}} moltk/index.html area
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png {{{svn update}}} python API area
    # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png {{{svn update}}} C++ API area
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Increment the version number in CMakeLists.txt and check it in
  # http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/checkbox_unchecked.png Post a message to the moltk-users list
